doc.title: The Wild Wild West

credit.role: Count Carlos Mario Vincenzo Robespierre Manzeppi
Assistant Secretary of State Levering Mayhew David

doc.plot: James West and Artemus Gordon are two agents of President Grant who take their splendidly appointed private train through the west to fight evil. Half science fiction and half western, the Artemus designs a series of interesting gadgets for James that would make Inspector Gadget proud. A light hearted adventure series.
